Articles.Content:
Hello, I thought I would make this clear. We have had multiple imposters on the Kerbal Live Feed servers and we would like it to stop. We are looking for friendly, true and kind people who are just trying to enjoy the game. Not low life scum who impersonate other individuals like HarvesteR and other community managers and developers.

We can prove you wrong, it is not hard, so just give up, use your proper username, and can we just play some damn KSP?
Thank you sir, I am glad you agree! Come on KSP Community, we know you are better than this. Don't start changing!

Live feeds?

Kerbal Live Feed is a passive multiplayer mod which allows people to see each other, but not physically.
I agree that people should stop, we had a HarvesteR imposter earlier today.

Maybe it was really HarvesteR?

Unfortunately it's responses like that these people are trying to provoke, so you may have just sentenced them to another episode of impostors. The GIFT keeps on giving. (them, not you)

No I meant that it really could have been him checking the server out, not that it was right for impostors to imitate him. There will just be imposters until they include a name registration system and lock out names already used (like IRC). Blaming the users is kind of silly in this case... and this thread is going to generate more imposters than my previous post. I'd not heard of KLF until this.
You're right NeoMorph, it does need to be solved by technical means. I would have been more accurate to quote the OP rather than your reply

You're right NeoMorph, it does need to be solved by technical means. I would have been more accurate to quote the OP rather than your reply

Perhaps the mod can authenticate against the forum or KSP Store.

Perhaps the mod can authenticate against the forum or KSP Store.

How about finding all the usernames of the devs and blocking people from using their names?

You need to understand something. It was not HarvesteR and I proved him wrong VERY easily. I mentioned a 24 live stream that xxleGoldFishxx did and I was live with him, Chad Jenkins, HarvesteR and I said what did my sponsors promise at the end of the live stream. If he would of know, he would have answered. But he rambled and tried changing the topic and then giving stupid responses. HarvesteR is a smart man, and he knows who I am, this fool did not.

We arent stupid people, we know how to find things out, that is one of the good things about being on the interest and having a wide variety of knowledge in finding things out. Don't play us, we just want to play some Kerbal Space Program and TALK TO SOME PEOPLE. Not deal with this CHILDISH BULL like EVERYWHERE ELSE!
Get really mad, that's not what the trolls want at all.

How about finding all the usernames of the devs and blocking people from using their names?

Or IP address. You could block names such as HarvesteR and C7Studios, but only allow it if they send you a PM with their IP to put them on the whitelist. I've done something like this before.

Get really mad, that's not what the trolls want at all.

I am not getting mad, sorry for being a little passionate about something like come on.. this is ridiculous dont you think? So what, are you saying you are one of them?

Capn't Skunky and I are in contact and we will be finding out who they are and they will be dealt with accordingly. Good luck.
Yeah, I guess there will always be people like that, every were over the internet, I hope not thou
